id - Variable in class loading.Texture
The id of the texture

the input stream from the server

the input stream from the client
inc(int) - Method in class utility.PerlinNoise
Method used for repeating perlin noise.
init() - Method in class gameobject.Gameobject
Initialize the gameobject.
init - Static variable in class input.Keyboard
has the class been initialized?
init(long) - Static method in class input.Keyboard
Initializes the keyboard input
this class should not be used without calling this method first
init - Static variable in class input.Mouse
has the class been initialized?
init(long) - Static method in class input.Mouse
Initializes the Mouse input
this class should not be used without calling this method first
init() - Method in class main.Main
Called directly before the main loop starts.
init() - Method in class network.NetClient
Start listening to the server and sending input information to the server
inited - Variable in class gameobject.Gameobject
Has the gameobject been initialized
initGL() - Method in class main.Main
Init OpenGL
INITIAL_HEALTH - Static variable in class components.Player
The number of health points the player starts with
INITIAL_PLAYER_LIVES - Static variable in class components.Player
The lives the player has after joining the game

Called before the first update of the component.
initWindow() - Method in class main.Main
Init the OpenGL window
inkove(Object[]) - Method in class utility.Callback
generic callback method
input - package input
 
inRunnable - Variable in class network.NetClient
Runnable for retrieving data from server

the runnable for input operations

thread for handling input
inThread - Variable in class network.NetHandle

intialized - Variable in class gameobject.Component
has the start method already been called
intsToDouble(int[]) - Static method in class utility.ByteUtility
Reverse method of the above one
isAlt(int) - Method in class input.Modifiers
is alt down
isBlocking - Variable in class physics.Collider
Can other objects pass through the collider
if on one of the colliders has isBlocking == false the colliders can pass through each other.
isClient() - Method in class network.Network
Is this a client
isClosing - Static variable in class main.Main
true if the window is closing
isControl(int) - Method in class input.Modifiers
is crtl down
isDestroyed() - Method in class gameobject.Component
Has the component been destroyed
isIntialized() - Method in class gameobject.Component
Has the component been initialized
isKeyDown(int, int) - Static method in class input.Keyboard
Is the given key down for the given player
If the playerID equals Game.net.playerID the local input is check otherwise the input is received through network
isMouseButtonDown(int) - Static method in class ui.Ui
Is the Mouse button down TODO do this in Mouse class
isServer() - Method in class network.Network
Is this a server
isShift(int) - Method in class input.Modifiers
is shift down
isStatic - Variable in class physics.Collider
can the collider be moved TODO replace this with endless mass after implementing force into physics
isSuper(int) - Method in class input.Modifiers
is the super key down
Note: e.g.
isVSync - Static variable in class main.Main
Is vSync currently active (must not be correct)
